author: martinc
msg: Make the derived form bean name available from the form tag, so that the
nested tags have access to that. The nested tags were previously taking
advantage of the fact that the 'name' attribute was being modified to hold
the derived bean name. Fixing the form tag to not do that therefore broke
the nested tags. Now the nested tags call getBeanName() instead of
getName().
Submitted by: Steve Byrne

author: martinc
msg: Add the resources pages to the struts-documentation webapp. These were
missed because there is now a separate 'compile.website' target, which
does not relate to the struts-documentation.war webapp. That webapp is
what is normally used to update the web site. We need to find a better
way to do this. (I'm not sure why there is a separate 'compile.website'
target, though, given that the war file updates everything.)

author: martinc
msg: Added Raible Designs as a Powered By Struts site.
Submitted by: Matt Raible
